description: a view of the roof of a house in the center of the image flanked by a man on the left and a woman on the right side of the house; a bird sits on top of the roof and there are houses in the background; a sun shines in the upper right side of the sheet
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: 1. | LLC of sheet in red pencil, on verso: 94
signed: LRC of sheet, in pencil: P.W. Gramatté 19 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Die fernen Geliebten
title: The Distant Lovers (1)
